name: uc1pcl
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4

stmt.origin: simp1bi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c2), wne(c0, cfv(c0g, c3)), wcel(cfv(cfv(cco1, c0), cfv(cfv(cdg1, c4), c0)), cfv(cui, c4)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c2))
-| wb(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c0, c2), wne(c0, cfv(c0g, c3)), wcel(cfv(cfv(cco1, c0), cfv(cfv(cdg1, c4), c0)), cfv(cui, c4))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c2))
-| wb(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c0, c2), wne(c0, cfv(c0g, c3)), wcel(cfv(cfv(cco1, c0), cfv(cfv(cdg1, c4), c0)), cfv(cui, c4))))

stmt.origin: isuc1p(c0, c1, c2, cfv(c0g, c3), cfv(cdg1, c4), cfv(cui, c4), c3, c4)
stmt.pretty: isuc1p(c0, c1, c2, (0 ` c3), (deg1 ` c4), (Unit ` c4), c3, c4)

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c0, c2), wne(c0, cfv(c0g, c3)), wcel(cfv(cfv(cco1, c0), cfv(cfv(cdg1, c4), c0)), cfv(cui, c4))))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cpl1, c4))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3))
-| wceq(cfv(c0g, c3), cfv(c0g, c3))
-| wceq(cfv(cdg1, c4), cfv(cdg1, c4))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cuc1p, c4))
-| wceq(cfv(cui, c4), cfv(cui, c4))

cumulated.origin:

-| wceq(c3, cfv(cpl1, c4))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3))
-| wceq(cfv(c0g, c3), cfv(c0g, c3))

-| wceq(cfv(cui, c4), cfv(cui, c4))

|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c2))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cpl1, c4))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3))
-| wceq(cfv(cdg1, c4), cfv(cdg1, c4))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cuc1p, c4))
-| wceq(cfv(cui, c4), cfv(cui, c4))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c0 ∈ c2)
⊣ c3 =(Poly1 ` c4)
⊣ c2 =(Base ` c3)
⊣ (deg1 ` c4)=(deg1 ` c4)
⊣ c1 =(Unic1p ` c4)
⊣ (Unit ` c4)=(Unit ` c4)

comment: Unitic polynomials are polynomials. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Mar-2015.)
